psdcms.simulation
Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
  psdcms.simulation.Simulator
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.BindingController, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.LifeCycleController, UTPublishTask
public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.BindingController, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.LifeCycleController, UTPublishTask

The simulator class for running specific tasks given by the Usertask.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Amir Moulavi (amir.moulavi@gmail.com), Uwe Dauernheim (uwe@dauernheim.net)
